title: Cosmic Queries – Science Storytelling with LeVar Burton
description:
What science concepts have we not seen in fiction? On this episode, Neil deGrasse Tyson and comic co-host Chuck Nice sit down with actor and national treasure LeVar Burton to discuss future science, storytelling, and to answer fan questions. 

NOTE: StarTalk+ Patrons can watch or listen to this entire episode commercial-free.

Thanks to our Patrons Gabriel Paavola, Robert Marchal, DarenW, Im The Wiener Dog, vamsee krishna jayanthi, Stan Russell, Balackey, Chris Page, Paul Anderson, and Angy Phillips for supporting us this week.

Photo Credit: NASA/Don Pettit, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
author: feed@startalkradio.net (Neil deGrasse Tyson, Chuck Nice, LeVar Burton)
